name: Dead Crusade (Canceled)
blurb: A Medieval Co-Op Horror game powered by Unreal Engine 4, set in real world 14th century Europe during the Black Death pandemic.

rewards.reward:
AFFLICTED (digital)
============================= 
THE GAME + INSIDER FORUM + TIER FORUM BADGE
============================= 
EARLY BIRD: Get the $25 reward for only 15$!

AFFLICTED (digital)
============================= 
THE GAME + INSIDER FORUM + TIER FORUM BADGE
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS

● This tier includes the DRM-Free digital download of Dead Crusade plus `Insider Forum` access to exclusive developer updates featuring developer videos, first looks at in-game shots, writing from the game, game art, development polls and much more. ● Forum Badge: Afflicted

● Early access to Beta- Play Dead Crusade months before launch! ● Receive a Kickstarter Exclusive Wallpaper Pack. ● Get listed as a `Contributor` in the games credits ● Forum Badge: Infected

You will receive an earlier early access code to get digital downloads of the alpha builds ● Get the MP3 soundtrack from composer Mitchell Gibbs ● Digital Art Book containing all of the concept art, character renders, and storyboards used to create Dead Crusade  ● Forum Badge: Plagued

============================= INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS

● Recieve two DRM-Free digital downloads of Dead Crusade  ●  Early beta access is not early enough? Alpha access grants even earlier access! You will receive two early Alpha access code to get digital downloads of the alpha builds ● Forum Badge: Plauged Pack Rat

DECAYED (Collector's Edition)
=============================
BOXED GAME + 4 DIGITAL VERSIONS + LIMITED EDITION 11" x 17" POSTER + T-SHIRT + CD SOUNDTRACK + CLOTH MAP + WALLPAPER PACK + SPECIAL CREDITS + INSIDER FORUM + TIER FORUM BADGE
=============================
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS

● Receive an exclusive Dead Crusade special boxed edition containing the game for Windows. The boxed version will be available only through this Kickstarter campaign ● 4 digital versions of Dead Crusade ● Exclusive 11" x 17" Poster ● Get an exclusive, limited edition  Dead Crusade T-shirt ●  CD Soundtrack by composer Mitchell Gibbs ● Limited Edition detailed cloth map ● Get listed as a `Executive Backer` in the games credits ● Forum Badge: Decayed

DEFILED (Collector's Edition)
=============================
BOXED GAME + 4 DIGITAL VERSIONS +  ART BOOK + LIMITED EDITION 18" x 24" POSTER + T-SHIRT + CD SOUNDTRACK  + CLOTH MAP + WALLPAPER PACK + SPECIAL CREDITS + INSIDER FORUM + TIER FORUM BADGE
============================= 
 INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ● Receive an exclusive Dead Crusade special boxed edition containing the game for Windows. The boxed version will be available only through this Kickstarter campaign ● 4 digital versions of Dead Crusade .● Art Book containing all of the concept art, character renders, and storyboards used to create Dead Crusade ● Exclusive 18" x 24" Poster ● Get an exclusive, limited edition  Dead Crusade T-shirt ●  CD Soundtrack by composer Mitchell Gibbs ● Limited Edition detailed cloth map ● Get listed as a `Executive Backer` in the games credits ● Forum Badge: Defiled

UNDERTAKER
============================= 
DEATH NOTE + SPECIAL CREDITS + TIER FORUM BADGE
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS 

●  Have your name and a fun personal R.I.P inscription written on Gravestone Relics spread through out the game world. When discovered, your name and personal inscription will be displayed on screen, and players will receive an experience or health bonus! Some restrictions apply. ● Get listed as a `Executive Benefactor` in the games credits ● Forum Badge: Undertaker

BLACKSMITH
============================= 
FORGED STEEL SWORD  + RAMPANT LION BANNER +  IN-GAME ITEMS + TIER FORUM BADGE 
============================= INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS

Your very own real-life, authentic hand-forged steel sword with custom Dead Crusade engraving and a personalized inscription- Complete with a intricate scabbard to sheath the sword! ● Also receive a historical 48" Rampant Lion Banner made of durable cotton that include a wooden hanging rod for easy wall mounting (your choice of 2 colors) ● Be the envy of all players! We will be giving each class a Kickstarter exclusive in-game head item that gives players a unique look. The Plague Doctor will recieve a Brim Hat, the Soldier a Horned Helm, the Executioner a Studded Half Mask, and the Skirmisher a Nottingham Chaperon. ● Forum Badge: Blacksmith

MASTER FLESH EATER
============================= 
BECOME A ZOMBIE PACKAGE + SPECIAL CREDITS + TIER FORUM BADGE ============================= INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS 

● Our artists will intricately design and sculpt your face and head in 3D and turn you into a zombie (male or female) for actual in-game use. We will work with you through the development process, as we turn you from a beautiful human into a decayed flesh eating member of the horde ●  We will also create a 3D Printed Statue of the final result and send it to you, as well as create a special in game Wallpaper, an exclusive 18" x 24" Poster of your character likeness rendered inside Unreal Engine 4, and even a special in-game video of your zombie self as a thank you! Shipping is on us. Must supply high res pictures of yourself (or a loved one) for our artists to reference ● Get listed as a `Special Guest Developer` in the games credits ● Forum Badge: Master Flesh Eater

ASSISTANT DESIGNER
============================= 
BECOME A HERO PACKAGE + TEAM MEETING + SPECIAL CREDITS + TIER FORUM BADGE ============================= INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS 

● Become part of the world of Dead Crusade! We'll design a Hero NPC and scripted encounter with your input and likeness. We will work closely with you to intricately design and sculpt your face in 3D and add it to a NPC hero character of your choosing. You can be the leader of a travelling caravan under attack by the plagued, a Priest with an attitude who gives players a hard time, or whatever you want (within reason)! ● We will work with you on both the mission design as well as your heroes role and dialogue. We will have all of your written lines delivered by a professional voice actor! ●  You will also receive a 3D Printed Statue of your hero character in an action pose of your choice, an exclusive 18" x 24" Poster of your in-game character rendered inside Unreal Engine 4, and even a special in-game video of your hero self as a thank you! Shipping is on us. Must supply high res pictures of yourself (or a loved one) for our artists to reference ● Join an official team meeting through Skype where you can listen in as we collaborate and discuss progress of the game ● Get listed as a `Assistant Designer` in the games credits ● Forum Badge: Assistant Designer
